snippet.title: New features we've been working on in Among The Wild (+ Closed Alpha info!)
snippet.description:
We've been hard at work on the game the past couple of months and we're looking forward to sharing with you our progress!
Among The Wild is a first-person farming game where you wrangle fantastical creatures, build and manage your own idyllic farm, and set out to explore uncharted corners of a strange universe.

Website (Closed alpha sign up) ► https://www.amongthewildgame.com
Reveal Trailer ► https://youtu.be/jKjbvxNwpAE
Wishlist on Steam ► https://store.steampowered.com/app/2400980/AMONG_THE_WILD/

Socials:
TikTok ► https://www.tiktok.com/@amongthewildgame
Xitter ► https://www.twitter.com/amongthenuggets
Reddit ► https://www.reddit.com/r/amongthewild
Instagram ► https://instagram.com/amongthewildgame
Threads ► https://threads.net/amongthewildgame
Bluesky ► https://bsky.app/profile/amongthewild.bsky.social
Mastodon ► https://mastodon.social/@amongthewild
Facebook ► https://www.facebook.com/PlayAmongTheWild

Timestamps:
0:00 Intro, explosions, and Baller plushie
1:43 World Generation
2:43 Seasons
3:33 Creature Trading
4:10 Building Improvements
5:18 Gameplay Rebalance
5:59 Save System
6:21 Controller Support, Options menus, Build pipeline
6:42 Story, Lore, and Quests
7:07 Revamped the Market 
7:41 New enemies
8:00 MOST IMPORTANT NEW FEATURE
8:29 Stuff we haven't got done yet
9:09 Closed Alpha info
10:09 Thanks for watching!!
